about.description: A professional with solid experience in customer service and retail management, transitioning to the tech sector. Recently certified in web development and JavaScript, with skills in React JS and a focus on providing practical and creative solutions. Known for organizational skills, adaptability, and customer orientation.

responsibilities: Managed daily store operations: opening, closing, and overall organization.
Provided personalized customer service and resolved conflicts.
Negotiated prices and logistics with suppliers.
Managed cash flow and electronic payments.
Assisted customers with product selection and purchases.
Managed product replenishment and display maintenance.
Handled cash register and payment systems.
Coordinated documentation for shipments and product receipt.
Managed staff to optimize operational resources.
